project1.title: Solar System
project1.description: This solar system informational dashboard makes use of jQuery which allowed me to easily and efficiently select elements and attach event listeners.

project2.title: FreeLancer
project2.description: FreeLancer is a rennaissance fair planning app. My portion of this group project was to build out the food items page by using firebase to drive the app with data.

project3.title: Nautilus Explorer
project3.description: Part two of a CRUD focused firebase project, Nautilus Explorer saw our group working with a more complex data structure, requiring us to pull multiple axios calls together.

project4.title: Not Pinterest
project4.description: Modeled after the popular link and image sharing site, Not Pinterest leverages firebase to perform CRUD (create, read, update, delete) functionality on a data set.
